Introduction

Pyo Hye Mi (recognized as just Hyemi) is a South Korean singer and actress under MEFLEX Entertainment. She is best known as a member of 9MUSES, its sub-group 9MUSES A, and the ballad duo Me:us.

Before Hyemi's official debut, she performed at the Chin Chin Song Festival in May 2009, showcasing her vocal abilities, and later obtained a silver award. In January 2010, Hyemi reportedly signed an agreement under Star Empire Entertainment and debuted as a vocalist in the girl group 9MUSES, with the first single album, "Let's Have A Party" in August of that same year.

In August 2016, Hyemi debuted as a member of 9MUSES's first sub-group, 9MUSES A, with the single album "MUSES DIARY". In October, Hyemi was appointed as the new leader of the group following the departure of Hyuna.

In February 2019, Star Empire announced that 9MUSES had officially disbanded as Hyemi and fellow group members collectively chose to not renew their contracts.

In November 2022, Hyemi signed an exclusive contract with MEFLEX Entertainment to explore her career as an actress advancing under her full name.

In April 2022, Hyemi, alongside former 9MUSES member Hyuna, debuted as a ballad duo Me:us, under A Flat Entertainment, releasing their first single album, "Memories".

On March 21, 2023, it was reported by JTBC that 9MUSES A would be reuniting and making a comeback in May, followed by their parent group between July and August.

Fun facts

1
Hyemi is a big Harry Potter fan and was seen wearing her House Robes a few times. Her Hogwarts House is Gryffindor.
…
2
Hyemi´s nicknames are "snaggletooth fairy" and "charmander".

3
Hyemi loves bowling and plays whenever she needs to relieve stress. Her skills are so good that she was even acknowledged by professionals. She also won the Gold Medal in Bowling for the Female Category at the 2018 Idol Athletic Championships - Chuseok Sp
…
4
Hyemi is the only female idol who went from being the youngest member to being the leader of a group.
…
5
Hyemi is a big fan of "Overwatch" which she regularly plays with fellow member Keumjo. Their love for it is so well-known that they were invited to the "Soldier 76" Tournament as official guests.
…
6
Hyemi´s current ideal type is actor Lee Dongwook, who famously starred in hit drama "Goblin".
…
7
Hyemi is a huge fan of Wanna One´s Jisung and even voted for him during Produce101.

Hyemi is very passionate about musicals and already starred in 2 Productions called "The Russian Coffee" (2016) and "Hello Fukushima" (2016/2017).
